review: I bought this as a gift for my 2 grandchildren.  They really like the games available as well as Netflix.  I was not aware of at the time is that in the games they cannot play against each other which deflated it a bit.  I had bought 2 controllers and I only needed 1 due to this.  Also I was not aware that it required a smart TV.  I do not remember this being disclosed either.  Overall I think it is a hit but wished I had known this prior to purchase.
author: teresa hurley
